name: The Island (itch) (isaacreadDD)
description:
Title: The Island 

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: The lego adventure game has two levels, This game is based on LEGO mods to create. The first one you should come to find the win  to pass level2. It hides on idslands. Come to explore the game and protect yourselves from traps shoots! 

 Instructions: Need norman keyboard and mouse. Tips: You should have nice jump skills and exploration skills. Players should try to think about where the win is. On the firt level, the win trophy is hide on the world, players need to explore different parts of the world to discover the trophy and thus enter the second level. On the second level, players should get 15 pickups to win. There are 32 pickups, you just need to get 15 pickupes by different ways and challenges.

Game Design Team: Junqian wang- game designer 

If people have some issues problem for playing game on this website ,here is unity website to play :  my builds - Unity Play  https://play.unity.com/mg/lego/build-voe
